DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluate Ocular Tolerance SYL1001 Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Subjects must provide sign inform consent prior participation . BMI 19,5 29 kg/m2 . Normal ocular test eye : IOP < /=21 mmHg . BCVAof > /=0,8 ( 20/25 ) Snellen scale , < /=0.1 LogMar . Normal fluorescein Clearance Test eye . Normal funduscopy eye . Pregnant breastfeeding female positive pregnancy test use medically acceptable contraceptive method selection study . Current relevant disease . Previous chronic process rebound characteristic could interfere study accord investigator 's judgment . Volunteers receive pharmacological treatment , include medicinal plant , four week previous begin study . Having use corticoid sporadically last 30 day whichever route aof administration , med ocular nasal administration route . Case history hypersensitivity meds allergic process . Visual alteration : previous eye surgery , glaucoma , use lens , uveitis ocular surface pathology ( dry eye , blepharitis ) . Volunteers visual alteration 3 dioptre either eye . Volunteers participate clinical trial past fout month study entry . Blood derivate transfusion six previous month study entry . Case history drug alcohol abuse dependence . Positive result test drug abuse selection period . positive serology result hepatitis B virus ( HbsAg ) , virus C VIH . Analytic alteration medically relevant , investigator 's judgement .
